resources.string: Greetings, human! Come to do battle with a %1$s again, eh? How spiffing. Choose your method of %1$s defeat!

So, you chose memes.
The good news: %1$ss are weak towards memes.
The bad news: The %1$s is woefully out of touch. Proceed accordingly.
The %1$s is browsing the internet, using Internet Explorer; they laugh, saying "Haha, that cat wants to haz cheezburger!" Your phone at the ready, hit him with your best meme.
In Soviet Russia, you defeat %1$s! Here though, you die.
The %1$s proves the age old adage, "If your memes aren't funny, a %1$s will rip you limb from limb." Better luck next time!
The %1$s has laughed himself to death, improbably. Good job, memelord.
Hmmm, that didn\'t really jive, try again perchance?
You\'ve shown the %1$s that meme before; He\'s not impressed
You don\'t get the feeling the %1$s found that terribly funny…
The %1$s laughs, clearly appreciating your meme.
The %1$s laughs and laughs, slapping it\'s knee. I guess you could call it a real…funny meme!
The %1$s suddenly looks angry, and tells you to get back in your basement!
You chose \"Axe\". As in, the thing the %1$s is most likely to kill you with. Okay Zoomer, let\'s see if you can end up dead here.

Each round, choose to either attack or defend; successfully defending means you take no damage, and deal a small amount of damage in return, while attacking obviously damages the %1$s the most, but you could die very quickly.
Very well, human, a quest it shall be.\nAs you journey, you will gain keywords that will effect your choices; choose wisely!

Erm.\nWell, okay, I guess I did offer it.\nYou pull out your phone and install the app \"Love at First Bite,\" the premier dating app for %1$ss. After setting up a profile, you show the %1$s all the single Lady %1$ss in the area he can connect with. (Choose a %1$s lady below and try and connect!)
Something went wrong while trying to login, try again soon?
Greetings, human! Log in to post and view feedback, and maybe unlock additional magic!

Ah, a capital idea, the %1$s will never see it coming! Partly because, you know, it makes no sense. You challenge the %1$s to an art competition, and it agrees.\n\nYou\'ll be asked to draw shapes quickly and well; try and do better than the %1$s in 3 rounds to win!
